title: French website to learn cardano
description: ウェブ上には、カルダノのエコシステムを学ぶことができるフランスのウェブサイトはありません。DefiやNftなどのコンセプトが知られているはずです。

f6_assessments.q0: Creating of a French blog on Cardano could be useful to bringing French speaking users to the ecosystem. It would be nice to see more information on what would actually be covered.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer Claims to have significant experience in Search engine optimization,  digital marketing and languages.  These will be important in driving eyeballs to the blog. There is however no mention of any blockchain or Cardano experience or details on what content will actually be created. 
Compare this to the "Spanish News, Insights, Onboarding" proposal where the proposers already have a large catalogue of content they are translating into Spanish for less than 1/3 the cost of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a timeline to produce a given number if articles at various times and a goal on a total number of views which is easy to audit. There is not detail on what content will actually be produced. How do we measure whether what has been produced is useful? Perhaps unique views per month is not the best metric? If users keep returning to use the content that shows the content is engaging and useful.

f6_assessments.q0:
- I liked the fact that you're a SEO specialist, which means that you know the means to reach lots of people and identify what they're willing to know.
- One point that should have been more explored is the metrics – you said that the intention is to have 100k new visitors in the end of 12 months, however it could be more stratified in the previous months
f6_assessments.q1:
- One thing that I am missing is the evidence that you're a SEO specialist, and moreover, how are the means that you'll use to achieve your goals (know what they're seeking, how are you going to reach them, how are you going to create value to them, etc).
- Other aspect that should be added is an example of the piece you want to create and send to the people, since you're aiming to write 300 pieces in 6 months (which seems to be a lot).
- Other point is the scalability, how are you planing to continue creating content after the money end? How are you planing to keep everything running ?
- There is no budget associated with marketing of the blog
f6_assessments.q2: - I am missing some more detailed and stratified metrics (besides having only one objective in the end of an year, it would be good to see the growth). And the def. of success should be the attendance, not the quantity of pieces created (you could create 1000 and none of them be read)

f6_assessments.q0:
French speakers are a good and broad target audience and I like the association with search engines and kewords, its essential nowadays. However it's not clear how this platform/website would differenatiate from others. It would be good to have some sense of how many sites or blogs to talk about Cardano in french exists (if its a few, then it has a higher potential, if its several, there need to have a good differentation in its content and/or UX). What kind of content will be published here? If it is really a learning platform, what educational methods will be put in place?
 Also, if the main objective of this campaing is to attract non english speaker and the final idea of this proposal (as stated in the image) is to direct them to Cardano community, which is mostly in english, I dont see it solving it main campaing objective. An extra step should be necessary to make Cardano community as a whole fully accessible to these people.
Also, it could be said somewhere in the proposal whether the main intent is to translate english article or generate new ones (or even a mix).
It would be nice also to have a place to interact and debate in french, maybe integrating in other platforms like telegram, where people can ask questions freely and get answered by french-and-english speakers who can better understand english content.
f6_assessments.q1:
A simple website with blogposts and tutorials can be deployed by one person, specially if it is someone expericed with digital marketing as this person is. The plan could have a bit more details but the costs are broken down fairly. In addition, if it is a learning platform, as in the titlte, someone experienced in education should take part on it.

Understanding if the main intent is justo translate or generating new content would help to assess feasibility. One person generating 100 new articles from scratch in one month would make me worry about the quality of it (3,3 quality articles per day seems a lot - thoug not impossible).
f6_assessments.q2:
There are indicators related to number of content and visitors spread in a timeline which is essential - though it could have more targets (for instance, number of visitor after each month, not onlt after 1 year)
 Other indicators related to quality of the content, time spent in the website, number of visitors in different countries reached could also be monitored.
Some risks could be considered related to competition with other french websites about Cardano

f6_assessments.q0: Having a website in French may help french speakers to get into Cardano. However, the proponent assumes that there's no similar initiatives regarding other topics such as Defi and NFTs, which is not true. Moreover, beyond just releasing content in French Language, it's also necessary to access potential readers (as not everyone comes voluntarily to learn about it), and this is not on the roadmap of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: Although the proposer has experience in digital marketing, he/she has not pointed to any information on production of digital resources or educational content. Producing educational resources to large audiences requires lots of effort and experience to be sustainable and reach the goals of explaining things to the audience.
f6_assessments.q2: The milestones are clear and it's possible to track the progress based on the proposal. However, the plan of having 600 hundred articles published, plus a functioning and well-designed website in 6 months is too audacious.

f6_assessments.q0: In order to generate impact to Cardano Ecosystem, we have always to keep in mind that language is one of the biggest barriers. This proposal helps solving this problem because delivers contents about Cardano with quality and performance marketing (using SEO strategy for example, the website can reach more people) to people who only speaks French.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer says that in one month could publish 100 pieces of content. Is it possible considering only 1 person planning and creating the content? After month 6, wouldn't be produced more content until month 12? It's not clear on the proposal. I missed in this proposal the goals of visitors per month. And a pertinent question is: are the proposer thinking about use paid traffic to increase the website visibility?
f6_assessments.q2: It's known that nowadays websites have metrics to measure their success. The proposal can be audited by separating the goal number of visits on the website per month and comparing to the realized at the end of each month. The amount of articles published also can be audited and compared to the numbers of people who only speaks French entering in Cardano world (it can be by the amount of only French speakers buyng Cardano [if there is a way to access this number] or entering in Project Catalyst).

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is good and if implemented in the right way, would be very good for Cardano - Any education and advertsing will pay itself back manymany times in token value.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no clear businessplan for how this project would be selfsustaining after the funding - And also lacks information about the target of the audience.
f6_assessments.q2: Can be auditted, but hard to asses the quality of the content and idea.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal clearly articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer team states that it has the necessary experience. However, they did not provide any links or references to support this statement. The budget figure of 21k USD requested seems high.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones and a defined time horizon. There are also several metrics that measure the success of this project. I recommend adding further metrics like so that more areas of this project are auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea itself is good, and meets the challenge's objectives, because it promises to create content related to our ecosystem in French, and also to do it in a strategically planned way to attract new people to Cardano. The author claims to have experience with digital marketing and a type of strategy called SEO, which works by searching for keywords, and through this strategy he would promote his project. However, it would be interesting to explain better how the strategy works. We know that this site will be created, which will operate using keywords that relate to cryptocurrencies, blockchain, NFT, etc., in French. But we don't know how, for example, how this content will reach the target audience. Through pop ups? This, in my opinion, is not a very good idea, because people tend to close pop ups without even reading what is there, often pop ups are also related to malicious content, such as viruses, for example. The author of the proposal is willing to create a lot of content, but I found this promise very ambitious given the few details about the actual functioning of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: We don't have a satisfactory amount of information about the author, he just describes that he understands digital marketing, search engines and speaks several languages ​​(which ones?). Another point, if he speaks several languages ​​and the proposal aims to bring the Cardano ecosystem to more and more people, it would also be interesting to think about translating the created content into a language other than French, such as Spanish, for example. In addition to not having a more detailed explanation of who the author is, he does not demonstrate that he has planned to hire more members to form a team. I believe that to carry out this project, it would be important for there to also be a graphic designer, whether for the creation of the website or the pop ups, and it would also be positive if more than one person was responsible for the translation and creation of the content. The author of the proposal does not claim to have experience with the universe of cryptocurrencies and blockchain, which would be essential for the creation of safe and quality content on the subject. For these reasons, I didn't feel very confident and prepared by the author to execute the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Unfortunately, I couldn't understand if this marketing tool would work through keywords. Despite the author explaining how he intends to do in relation to the months, that is, what would happen each month, and how the financing money would be used, I found the explanations a little superficial. For example, who would write the content? And how often would they be created and released? A lot of content is promised, for example, from month 2 to month 3 the goal is to produce 100 contents. It would be important to understand who would draft them and how often they would be published. I believe that the implementation of the proposal could be much more detailed. We have information, but not enough to visualize a full and solid realization of the project, in addition to the fact that the financial amount requested is considerably high, which makes the need for details and full understanding of the proposal even more necessary for it to be able to credibility about the idea is created. Metrics are not established to measure the success of the proposal, which makes monitoring the community more difficult.

f6_assessments.q0: Their plan was unclear. It doesn't state how they are going to get more french people onto his blog it just says that they are going to do that. They did have lots of reasons and facts, but they do have a bit of an expensive budget.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer wants to create a website and make it a place where french people can learn about Cardano. They already have a background in digital marketing and can already speak 4 languages so it is not experience they lack. The plan did not give a detailed explanation on exactly how to get the website up and running and to get the French users on.
f6_assessments.q2: They have a plan that would be easy to audit. They also have a goal to get more French users.

solution: 私のフランス語ブログは、暗号とカルダノのエコシステムについてユーザーを教育します。フランス語を話す人が理解し、コミュニティに参加するのに役立ちます。
experience: 検索エンジン最適化のスペシャリスト、デジタルマーケティングのスペシャリスト、4カ国語スピーカー
